div.p: >>> BACK OF THE BOOK SEGMENT TENT, PINHEADS OF THE WEEK.
WE BEGIN WITH MCGUIRK’S SELECTION, WILLIAM SHATNER.
>> THE CONTRASTS BETWEEN THE PARTIES, THE TWO MAJOR
PARTIES, THE FUNDAMENTALS ON BOTH ENDS ARE NOT WHERE IT’S
AT. I THINK MRS. CLINTON WOULD
BE THE ONE TO BRING US TOGETHER IN SOME WAY.
THERE HAS GOT TO BE A WAY WHERE WHERE PEOPLE HOLDING
TO THEIR PRINCIPLES CAN GIVE SLIGHTLY SO MRS. CLINTON IS
GOING TO BRING US ALL TOGETHER.
>> I DIDN’T KNOW SHATNER WAS DOING COMEDY THESE DAYS.
GOING ON VENTURA’S SHOW. >> WHAT SHOW IS THAT.
>> SOME IDIOTIC SHOW I DON’T KNOW WHERE IT IT IS ON THE
WEB OR SOME CABLE TV. >> HE WENT TO MEXICO SO
DON’T LOOK FOR HIM. >> THAT DUDE VENTURA IS
SUING THE WIFE, THE WIDOW OF AMERICAN HERO CHRIS KEIL.
SUING HER PLUS HE BELIEVES THE UNITED STATES.
>> STIHL STICK WITH SHATNER. THINKS OBVIOUSLY SUPPORTING
SENATOR CLINTON. AND -- BUT, UNITING THE
COUNTRY? >> SHE COULDN’T UNITE HER
OWN PARTY IN 2008 IF YOU RECALL.
SHE WAS DON’T LIKE HER.
>> NOT ENTIRELY. I WAS IMPRESSED WITH A COUPLE
THINGS. NUMBER ONE WHEN SHE WAS A
SENATOR SHE WENT OVER A LOT OF REPUBLICANS, I DON’T KNOW IF IT
WAS INTENTIONAL. SHE DID.
SHE’S TIGHT WITH McCAIN AND GATES, I READ GATES’ BOOK.
HE REALLY LIKED HER. >> SHE’S GOING TO REUNITE
EVERYBODY -- >> NO, THERE IS THINGS SHATNER
IS SAYING. >> I GO WITH BALK.
>> FOR HIS PEN HEAD USED THE PROGRAM JEOPARDY, GO.
>> THIS PIZZA MAG NANT AND 2012 PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE WAS A MAT
MAJOR AT HISTORICALLY BLACK MOREHOUSE COLLEGE.
>> YOU GOT IT RIGHT AWAY, RIGHT? >> YES.
THEY ARE NOT TRYING TO GET THAT ANSWER AND I THINK THEY WERE
EMBARRASSED AND I THINK THE GIVE THE PEN HEAD TO THE WRITER,
SLASH PRODUCER. >> WHY?
>> BECAUSE HERMAN CANE IS NOT KNOWN AS A PIZZA MAKER.
HE’S A GUY WITH 999 AFRICAN AMERICAN GOP LEADING THE FIELD.
LIKE SAYING BILL O’REILLY, WHO IS BILL O’REILLY.
>> MOREHOUSE COLLEGE, THAT WAS OBSCURE.
>> I DON’T KNOW WHAT GOD FATHER PIZZA IS.
I THOUGHT THAT WAS A SANDWICH. I WORKED AT BEN GINS, THE BEST
YEARS OF MY LIFE. I WOULD SAY BILL O’REILLY, HE
HOSTS A NUMBER ONE SHOW IN THE LAND.
IF I WANTED TO EMBARRASS YOU, I WOULD SAY HE KICKED FOR MERITS,
TRIED OUT FOR THE NETS AND WRITES BOOKS.
THEY TRIED TO EMBARRASS HIM AND WE’RE NOT GOING TO FALL INTO THE
TRAP. >> LOOK, I THINK THAT THE MEDIA
DISCREDITED HERMANN CANE WHO IS A BRIGHT MAN --
>> THANK YOU -- >> ALONG HIMSELF A LITTLE BIT.
IT WAS THE MATH MAJOR THING THROUGH EVERYBODY OFF.
>> THE MATH MAJOR. >> PIZZA AND PRESIDENT --
>> WHEN I WATCH THE SHOW BACK, BILL, IS HE GOING TO AGREE WITH
ME. >> NO, WE’LL GO OVER THE SHOW
AFTER IT’S OVER WITH. WE’RE ALIGNED.
MY PEN HEAD OF THE WEEK IS PUTIN.
YOU-ALL KNOW HE’S A PEN HEAD AND CAUSING TROUBLE AND THE REASON I
SELECTED HIM, I WANT YOU TO READ THE ONLY ARTICLE, I MEAN THE
ONLY ARTICLE IN "TIME MAGAZINE," WRITING ABOUT PUTIN.
IT’S BRILLIANT AND SHORT AND MADELEINE ALBRIGHT NAILS IT
BETWEEN THE EYES. BEYONCE IS EMPOWERING EVERYBODY
AND -- >> SNOWDEN.
>> YOU GET A HEADACHE, MASSIVE HEADACHE.
READ ALBRIGHT’S PUTIN THING. YOU CAN’T DISAGREE WITH THAT.
>> THAT’S SUCH A STUPID LIST, AND YOU KNOW, THAT LIST AND --
>> EXCEPT FOR MEGYN KELLY NOW. >> YEAH.
